Name: Court
Description: A court is a governmental body with the power to adjudicate legal disputes, including both civil and criminal cases.

Properties.Name: Dissolved
Properties.Description: The date (if any) that this court was dissolved.

Properties.Name: Founded
Properties.Description: The date that this court was created.

Properties.Name: Jurisdiction
Properties.Description: The geographical area over which the court has immediate jurisdiction.

Properties.Name: Superior courts
Properties.Description: A superior court is one which is higher in the chain of appeal than this court.
